author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Check out NexiGo's Black Friday sale at: https://lmg.gg/NexiGoBF

It's nice to splurge on high-end displays but you don't NEED one if you just wanna game. Come check out what Plouffe purchased when he needed a decent gaming monitor for our latest Whale LAN. 120Hz without breaking the bank? Yes please.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1627253-i-bought-a-70-gaming-monitor-and-it%E2%80%99s-great/

Check out some of the monitors from the video! 

LG 24U411A-B 24-inch 120hz 1080p IPS: https://geni.us/oh6wx
Acer Nitro VG271U 27" 1440p 144hz IPS: https://geni.us/tYzWqlB
Pixio PX277 OLED Max V2 27" 1440p 240hz OLED: https://geni.us/xlnU
AOC Agon PRO AG276QZD2 27" 1440p 240hz OLED: https://geni.us/OPmSky
Alienware AW3225QF 31.6" 240hz QD-OLED: https://geni.us/JZizA5
Alienware AW2725D 27" 280hz QD-OLED: https://geni.us/rTLwW

Check out our Channel Partners:
Secretlab - Get up to $249 off during their Black Friday/Cyber Monday sale (ends Dec. 5 2025): https://lmg.gg/secretl
title: I Bought a $70 Gaming Monitor and It’s Great
